title: Rito Plz
body: I just came back from not playing league for quite a while, and noticed that the augmented chests are no longer available and i am ONE core short of the skin shard i have and really want, is it possible to be gifted one before they expire? I would drew a thing but I am a terrible artist

replies.body: They expired ages ago, bad luck

Riot has made the materials obsolete this patch so you cannot receive PROJECT: Cores. Sorry, but no skin shard. 
:(
